GameConditionDef.label: originium rain
GameConditionDef.description: Rain contaminated with active originium falls from the sky. Anyone outside risks contracting RK_Oripathy and agitating their condition.
GameConditionDef.letterText: Drops of ichorous fluid have begun falling from the sky.\n\nAnyone exposed has an incrased risk of contracting RK_Oripathy or agitate a preexisting condition.

GameConditionDef.label: originium storm
GameConditionDef.description: Rain contaminated with active originium falls from the sky. The originium seems to have worsened the storm.
GameConditionDef.letterText: Contaminated rain falls from the sky while lightning strikes the ground.\n\nAnyone exposed has an incrased risk of contracting RK_Oripathy or agitate a preexisting condition while the lightning will start fires.

GameConditionDef.label: originium dust storm
GameConditionDef.description: Strong winds have kicked up clouds of active originium dust. \n\nAnyone outdoors risks exposure to originium.
